opencode.title: OpenCode Configuration

modal.title: Customize Configuration File Path
modal.description: App settings have the highest priority. Configuration changes will be saved to this file.
modal.envWarningDesc: This tool only writes configuration to the specified path. To have OpenCode read from this path, you must manually set the OPENCODE_CONFIG environment variable to point to this file.
modal.placeholder: Enter or select configuration file path

configParseError.title: Configuration File Parse Error
configParseError.description: The OpenCode configuration file exists but has invalid JSON format. You can manually fix the file, or back it up and recreate it.
configParseError.confirmBackupContent: This will rename the current configuration file to a backup (e.g., .bak.20240115_143052), after which you can reconfigure.

otherConfig.title: Other Configuration
otherConfig.hint: Edit advanced settings in OpenCode config
otherConfig.autoSaveHint: Changes are saved automatically when you click outside the editor

ohMyOpenCode.title: Oh-My-OpenCode Configuration
ohMyOpenCode.sectionHint: Click "Add Config" in the top-right to pre-configure multiple model setups, then quickly switch via "Apply" or the system tray menu. "Common Config" is shared across all templates and will be merged with the applied config when writing to the config file.
ohMyOpenCode.sectionWarning: Note: Configs are stored in the app database. Do not manually edit the local config file — it will be overwritten by the next "Apply" operation.
ohMyOpenCode.configHint: Sub-agents handle specific tasks like architecture, code search, etc.
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceHint: Bulk replace one model with another across Agents and Categories (including custom entries) in this config.
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceToHint: Set the model to replace with
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceActionHint: Only matched entries will be replaced
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceRequired: Please select both source and target models
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceSameModel: Source and target models cannot be the same
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceInvalidFromVariant: Source variant does not match selected source model
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceInvalidToVariant: Target variant does not match selected target model
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceNoMatch: No matching model found in current config
ohMyOpenCode.batchReplaceSuccessWithVariantReset: Replaced {{count}} model entries and cleared {{variantCount}} incompatible variant values
ohMyOpenCode.agentModelsHint: Specify the model for each agent (including advanced agents). Leave empty to use defaults.
ohMyOpenCode.advancedSettingsHint: Configure advanced agent parameters (temperature, top_p, prompt_append, permission, etc.). Leave empty to use defaults.
ohMyOpenCode.categoriesHint: Set models and advanced parameters for delegate_task categories. Leave empty to use defaults.
ohMyOpenCode.disabledMcpsPlaceholder: Select MCPs to disable (e.g., context7, grep_app)
ohMyOpenCode.lspConfigHint: Configure LSP servers. See official documentation for details.
ohMyOpenCode.experimentalConfigHint: Experimental features may change in future versions. Use with caution.
ohMyOpenCode.otherFieldsHint: Custom configuration fields that will be flattened and written to the top level of oh-my-opencode.json. When switching profiles, the Agents Profile fields will be deeply merged and override the global config's fields with the same name.
ohMyOpenCode.otherFieldsGlobalHint: Global other configuration, used as base configuration. Will be deeply merged and overridden by Agents Profile configuration when switching.
ohMyOpenCode.noConfigs: No configs yet. Click the button above to add
ohMyOpenCode.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete config "{{name}}"?
ohMyOpenCode.pluginRequiredHint: Please add the oh-my-opencode plugin in Plugin Configuration first to use this feature
ohMyOpenCode.pluginRequiredDesc: Oh-My-OpenCode features are disabled. Please add the oh-my-opencode plugin in the Plugin Configuration section above, then you can manage and apply configurations.
ohMyOpenCode.slimConfigHint: Select the configuration file to use
ohMyOpenCode.disabledTooltip: This config is disabled and will not be applied to files
ohMyOpenCode.localConfigHint: From local file, will be saved to database after editing
ohMyOpenCode.importFromJsonHint: Paste your oh-my-opencode JSON configuration. After parsing, choose an import mode to auto-fill the form.
ohMyOpenCode.importFromJsonHintSlim: Paste your oh-my-opencode-slim JSON configuration. After parsing, choose an import mode to auto-fill the form.
ohMyOpenCode.importFromJsonInvalidFormat: Invalid JSON format. Please enter a valid configuration object.

ohMyOpenCodeSlim.sectionHint: Click "Add Config" in the top-right to pre-configure multiple model setups, then quickly switch via "Apply" or the system tray menu. "Common Config" is shared across all templates and will be merged with the applied config when writing to the config file.
ohMyOpenCodeSlim.sectionWarning: Note: Configs are stored in the app database. Do not manually edit the local config file — it will be overwritten by the next "Apply" operation.
ohMyOpenCodeSlim.pluginRequiredHint: Please add the oh-my-opencode-slim plugin in Plugin Configuration first to use this feature
ohMyOpenCodeSlim.pluginRequiredDesc: Oh-My-OpenCode-Slim features are disabled. Please add the oh-my-opencode-slim plugin in the Plugin Configuration section above, then you can manage and apply configurations.

errors.requireGitUrl: Please enter a Git repository URL
errors.noSkillsFoundInRepo: No Skills found in this repository. Please verify the URL is correct
errors.gitNotFound:
Git is not installed. Please install Git and try again.

Download from: https://git-scm.com
errors.gitTimeout:
Network connection timed out ({{seconds}}s).

Please check:
• Your network connection
• Proxy settings if applicable

You can adjust the timeout in Preferences if needed
errors.gitCommandFailed:
Git operation failed.

Please check:
• Your network connection
• The repository URL is correct
• Proxy settings if applicable
errors.gitFetchFailed:
Unable to fetch repository updates.

Please check:
• Your network connection
• For private repos, ensure SSH keys or access tokens are configured
errors.gitCloneFailed:
Unable to download repository: {{url}}

Please check:
• The repository URL is correct
• Your network connection
• For private repos, ensure access permissions are configured
errors.gitCheckoutFailed:
Branch "{{branch}}" does not exist.

Please verify the branch name or leave empty to use the default branch
errors.gitResetFailed:
Repository is in an inconsistent state.

Please delete this Skill and re-add it
errors.gitRevParseFailed:
Repository data is corrupted.

Please delete this Skill and re-add it
errors.checkSkillsPath:
Directory not found: {{path}}

Please verify the path is correct
